title: Callydgraphy
concept: Create a secure platform that allows consumers to view and purchase custom callygraphy art.
strategy: Create shopping cart within website parameters to store purchase data and utilize PayPal api for secure checkout.
resources: simpleCartjs, jQuery, handlebars.js, page.js, PayPal api

title: Personal Portfolio
concept: Create simple, personal website that links to coding projects and provides relevant education and career background to potential professional partners.
strategy: Intuitive, attractive, and simple 4-page website display.

title: TUMBLR INDIE TEXT GENERATOR
concept: Help users create personal Tumblr & Instagram quote square that utilizes unique user text input and pre-generated random color, sizing, and font options.
strategy: Utilize input fields and simple buttons to generate images.
